EN:
When I need a private relaxation and breath, this small and comfortable beer bar has become my preferred place.
Although the table is limited, there are many bar seats for anyone to enjoy.Guests are usually the same person and are very friendly. They hope to spend a pleasant time in a cup of cold coffee.
As a parent, sometimes you naturally become lonely because of the chaos at home.This place is just right.
The choice of beer is delicious, and the staff is very friendly at any time.
They also provide a wealth of bar food menu to satisfy your desire for delicious and crispy beer.
If you have a few minutes at the scene, check it out!And make sure you enjoy joy!

Original: 經過一整天的工作後，喝一杯冷精釀啤酒的好地方。這個地方氣氛很酷，是與朋友聚會喝酒聊天的好地方。老闆人很好，送的辣花生也很慷慨。雞柳是搭配啤酒的絕佳小吃。受到推崇的！
EN: After a whole day of work, drink a cup of cold brewed beer.The atmosphere of this place is cool, it is a good place to drink and chat with friends.The boss is very good, and the spicy peanuts are also generous.Chicken willow is an excellent snack with beer.Promote!

Original: 這可能是台北最好的精釀啤酒屋之一。  水龍頭的選擇非常棒，因為它們是真正的工藝品，而不是像我去過的其他一些工藝品一樣。  事實上，這是我去過的唯一有現成酸酒的地方之一。  大多數精釀啤酒屋都提供大量受歡迎的啤酒，例如 IPA、Ambers 和 Stouts。  然而，如果這個地方有酸味和季節，那麼就表明這個地方是真正的工藝。  此外，對於啤酒中心來說，食物相當不錯，超出了我的預期。  服務也很棒，我強烈推薦這個地方。
EN: This may be one of the best craft beer houses in Taipei.The choice of faucet is great because they are real crafts, not like some other crafts I have ever been.In fact, this is one of the only places I have been to ready -made acid wine.Most craft beer houses provide a large number of popular beer, such as IPA, Amber, and Stouts.However, if this place has sour taste and season, it indicates that this place is the real process.In addition, for the beer center, the food is quite good, which exceeds my expectations.The service is also great, I strongly recommend this place.

Original: 他們允許我在點餐前品嚐菜單上的兩到三道菜。我不知道這是不是基本的日本小零食，但是他們免費給了我，他們推薦的啤酒乾淨又香，服務很好很友好。
EN: They allow me to taste two to three dishes on the menu before ordering.I don't know if this is the basic Japanese snack, but they gave it to me for free. The beer they recommended was clean and fragrant, and the service was very good and friendly.

Original:
舒適的地方，提供精心釀造的啤酒和一些小吃。香腸真的很好吃，但是準備時間要長一些，所以一定要先點這個。你可以在決定點菜之前先放點啤酒，但有時你需要等待，因為那裡的工人可能不夠；）
真是個勞累一天後去的好地方！
EN:
A comfortable place, provide carefully brewed beer and some snacks.The sausage is really delicious, but the preparation time should be longer, so be sure to order this first.You can put some beer before deciding to order, but sometimes you need to wait, because the workers there may not be enough;)
It's a good place to go after a day of tiredness!

Original: 炸生蠔和啤酒很搭配。調酒師多收了小費，帳單不只是我點的。  這是我第二次注意到帳單不正確。  我認為老闆不應該讓員工多收帳單。
EN: Fried oysters and beer are very matched.The bartender collect more tips, the bill is not just me.This is the second time I have noticed that the bill is incorrect.I think the boss should not let employees receive more accounts.

Original: 老闆很友好，啤酒很美味。
EN: The boss is very friendly and beer is delicious.

Original: Buddha bar有來自英國的桶裝精釀啤酒，大約有5種可供選擇。如果您正在尋找有更多啤酒選擇的地方，請來這裡。然而，與我們在台灣旅行期間去過的其他酒吧相比，以及與家裡相比，氣氛有點太無聊了，不符合我們的口味。如果這種情況得到改善，也將吸引更多遊客。
EN: BUDDHA BAR has barrels of barrel beer from Britain, with about 5 options.If you are looking for more beer choices, please come here.However, the atmosphere is a bit boring compared to other bars we have visited in Taiwan and compared with our family, and it does not meet our taste.If this situation is improved, it will also attract more tourists.

Original: 老闆很友善，有歡樂時光制度，氣氛和音樂都很好。計劃常去拜訪
EN: The boss is very friendly, has a happy time system, and the atmosphere and music are very good.Plan often to visit

Original: 很棒的地方，有 J&D 啤酒，這是我嘗試過的最好的台灣精釀啤酒。試試 Mosaic Session 和他們的桶裝陳釀。
EN: A great place, there are J & D beer, which is the best Taiwan craft beer I have tried.Try Mosaic Session and their barrels.

EN: The staff here is very friendly to help me meet the needs of friends who can't eat gluten.Absolutely recommend it to locals and foreigners!

Original: 空間有限，太熱，啤酒不夠冷。調酒師很樂意為我們提供水，但沒有禮貌。一百萬年後不會回去。預計這個地方可能會在一兩年內消失🤔 …
